testcase.classname: Order Processing on Demo Web Shop
testcase.name: Successfully placing an order
testcase.system-out: Given The user opens the website in a browser...............................passed When The user clicks the login link.........................................passed And Enters valid credentials with email "ajmaldemo12@gmail.com" and password "Password123".passed And Navigates to the Computer section and selects Desktops..................passed And Chooses the second desktop from the list................................passed And Configures RAM and HDD preferences......................................passed And Clicks the "Add to Cart" button.........................................passed And Accesses the shopping cart menu.........................................passed And Clicks the "Go to Cart" button..........................................passed And Accepts the terms and conditions........................................passed And Clicks the "Checkout" button............................................passed And Selects or adds a new billing address...................................passed And Fills in the required billing details...................................passed And Proceeds with the shipping address......................................passed And Confirms the shipping method............................................passed And Chooses "Cash on Delivery" as the payment option........................passed And Verifies payment information............................................passed And Clicks the "Confirm" button.............................................passed Then A success message should be displayed..................................passed And The user logs out.......................................................passed
